name: Ayesha Khan
summary: From student coder to software engineer at a tech startup. Started learning programming in high school and now leads a team of 5 developers.
journey: Self-taught programmer → Computer Science degree → Junior Developer → Senior Software Engineer

name: Rahul Sharma
summary: Pursued nursing to serve the community. Now works in emergency care and mentors new nursing students.
journey: Science student → Nursing degree → ICU Nurse → Emergency Care Specialist

name: Priya Patel
summary: Graphic designer who started her own creative agency. Now works with major brands and has a team of 8 designers.
journey: Art student → Freelance designer → Creative agency founder → Brand consultant

name: Michael Chen
summary: Mechanical engineer who invented a sustainable energy solution. Now runs his own green technology company.
journey: Engineering student → R&D Engineer → Patent holder → Entrepreneur

name: Dr. Sarah Johnson
summary: Pediatrician who opened a free clinic in underserved areas. Has treated over 10,000 children and inspired many to pursue medicine.
journey: Pre-med student → Medical school → Residency → Community health advocate

name: David Rodriguez
summary: Marketing manager who became CEO of a Fortune 500 company. Started as an intern and worked his way up through dedication and innovation.
journey: Business student → Marketing intern → Brand manager → CEO

name: Lisa Thompson
summary: Photographer who captured award-winning images for National Geographic. Started with a simple camera and passion for storytelling.
journey: Art student → Wedding photographer → Travel photographer → Award-winning photojournalist

name: Ahmed Hassan
summary: Cybersecurity expert who protects major corporations from cyber threats. Started as a curious teenager hacking for fun, now saves companies millions.
journey: Computer enthusiast → Ethical hacker → Security analyst → Chief Security Officer

name: Emma Wilson
summary: Physical therapist who specializes in sports rehabilitation. Helped Olympic athletes recover from injuries and return to peak performance.
journey: Kinesiology student → Physical therapy school → Sports clinic → Olympic team therapist

name: Carlos Mendez
summary: Architect who designed sustainable buildings that won international awards. His eco-friendly designs are now used as models worldwide.
journey: Architecture student → Junior architect → Project lead → Award-winning sustainable architect

name: Jessica Park
summary: Tech entrepreneur who founded a successful app company. Started coding in college and now employs 50+ people in her growing startup.
journey: Computer science student → App developer → Startup founder → Tech CEO

name: Robert Kim
summary: High school teacher who became a principal and education reformer. His innovative teaching methods have improved graduation rates by 40%.
journey: Education student → High school teacher → Department head → School principal
